OUR VISIONARIES

From Our Director

"Imagination is more important than knowledge. For knowledge is limited to all we now know and understand, while imagination embraces the entire world, and all there ever will be to know and understand. " - Albert Einstein

A very warm welcome to the Rose Mary School of Excellence. At RMSE our mission is to provide positive catalytic impulses to every CHILD to stretch his inherent learning competencies through a self discovery process and inspire our students to engage in both academic and enriching extra-curricular programmes. Our students set high expectations for themselves, enjoy school and the community is constantly rewarded by their achievements.

Our curriculum develops student learning and understanding, a culture of thinking, inquiry and reflection, resilience and independence, always focused upon developing the whole child and tomorrow's international citizens. Beyond the classroom, RMSE will be offering its students many opportunities to reach the highest levels of attainment and performance. Our students will be regularly participating in a wide range of competitive and recreational sporting events, service learning and outdoor activities.

We hope that by browsing our website you will gain insight into the many opportunities and challenges that we offer our students and we would be delighted to welcome you to RMSE and to show you around our school. Please feel free to contact our Admissions Office if you wish to know more details.

At RMSE, we are ALL IN and ready to take it to the next level. We have the right team, it is the right time and we are on our way!

From Our Correspondent

As William Butler Yeats rightly says that "Education is not the filling of a pail but the lighting of a fire"

Education should awaken the joy in learning. It should ignite the fire of broadening the horizon of knowledge and clarity of perception and prepare himself/herself to make a worthy contribution to the world they live at large.

At Rose Mary School of Excellence, the uniqueness of each child is recognized, nurtured and treasured. Emphasis is on LEARNING and not on teaching.

Education is a complete process that leads to the attainment of the full potential of the child. Our endeavor is to equip our students with life-skills to face the real world - be it planning, organizing, deciding, questioning, reasoning, analyzing, team-building, communicating effectively or dealing with challenges confidently.

Our focus is to develop our students as global citizens, with tolerance, respect and appreciation of diverse cultures and religions for a life-time learning experience. They should be self-motivated, independent, confident decision makers to take up a leadership roles in future.

I firmly believe the partnership between our families and our school is an important part of our success. Students benefit when parents and guardians are involved in their learning. It is our goal to have consistent communication between home and school; and to offer regular opportunities for families to learn about what is happening at school.

I am very passionate about collaborating with students, parents, and teachers to help our students achieve their absolute best. I am looking forward to a great year at RMSE!

About Us

Established in 1981 Rosemary Institutions mark excellenceinall the realms of education. The Sprawling campus located in NGO New Colony, Perumalpuram is Uniquely placed intheheart of the city yet offers a serene environment for schooling. We are founded on the core competencies that are pertinent today and will be relevant for years to come. The Rosemary Education Network strives to create modern citizens who are equipped to take on challenges and primed to make global changes
